overview:
Jesse Maddox is an Atlanta-based Internet Executive and is currently the Founder & CEO of TripLingo. He graduated Magna cum Laude from Brown University in 2008 with a degree in Philosophy.

Prior to TripLingo, Jesse was the founder of The Janus Forum and BrunoBooks.com. The Janus Forum is one of Brown’s most active and innovative student groups, hosting events geared towards promoting thoughtful political discourse, with over 40 students actively involved in organizing the group’s activities.

BrunoBooks was the first online service to allow students to input their class schedule and compare textbook prices online. At BrunoBooks, Jesse established partnerships with 7 Student Councils representing over 300,000 students, including those at Harvard and Dartmouth.

After graduating from Brown, Jesse spent two years abroad in Vietnam and India. In Vietnam he was the Marketing Manager for Caterpillar’s Vietnam representative. In India, Jesse began work on TripLingo while working remotely throughout the country.
